mapper.select: select title, briefe, min_recharge as minRecharge, pay_start_time payStartTime, num, percentage, start_time startTime, end_time endTime, created_at createdAt from reds where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into reds ( title, briefe, min_recharge, pay_start_time, num, percentage, start_time, end_time, created_at )values ( #{title}, #{briefe}, #{minRecharge}, #{payStartTime}, #{num}, #{percentage}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, now() )
